attributes.action: Stop council issuing pcn to small driveway
attributes.additional_details: Redbridge borough are in particular issuing unfair pcn notices to drivers who are parking in the small driveway, as your aware the houses are built before 1940s have small driveway and council are ripping all residents, we want this to be fair for all residents they need to park their car without worrying getting a parking fine. I will urge your support and get this sorted out please without your help it’s not possible.
attributes.background: We want to stop council issuing parking tickets to residents small driveway.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions that relate to the work of the UK Government or Parliament. 

Parking enforcement is a matter for local councils. Given the specific cases you raise, you may want to consider starting a petition using the London Borough of Redbridge e-petition site http://moderngov.redbridge.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
